response.job_title: MEL Coordinator at GOYN - Bogotá | Sustainable Development Management | Project Management | Monitoring and Evaluation | Behavioral Science | Public Policy
response.summary: Magister in Public Policy with focus on sustainable development project management, 7 years' experience in project design; implementation; monitoring, evaluation & learning with NGOs; and research at a national level, in areas like education, conservation, gender, waste management, among others. Skills in strategic planning, negotiation, systemic thinking, and team leadership with a resourceful approach to problem solving.
response.skills: Behavioral Science, Circular Economy, Sustainable Development, Fundraising, Strategic Planning, Consulting, Reporting & Analysis, Team Management, Project Management, Market Analysis, Problem Solving, Microsoft Power BI, Statistical Data Analysis, Qualitative & Quantitative Research Methodologies, Microsoft Excel, Stata, R (Programming Language), Quantum GIS, NVivo

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Social Research Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Winners of the European Outdoor Conservation Association (EOCA) Fund 2021: "Fishing Plastic" Project

- Design the Project's Sustainability Strategy
- Structure and monitor all phases of the project. 
- Model and implement research instruments (surveys and interviews).
- Build the environmental and socioeconomic Monitoring and Impact Evaluation (MEL) Plan.
- Generate wok plans, risk assessments and other documents that achieve a satisfactory project execution.

Accomplishments:
- We achieved a 70% increase in the community's plastic recycling and reuse.
- Creation of Fishing Plastic Group: composed of young women from the community who develop environmental education workshops, guided tours in the village and a recycling startup.
profile_positions.title: Social Research Coordinator
